title: Help !
descriptions: Welcome on this card search engine for Hearthstone.
This is mobile version of hearthstone-card-search.com.
It has been made for simple and powerful search thanks to :

texts.title: Text search
descriptions: Text search can search words contained in all card text content (title, description, type...).
Text search works with full words. For example, searching 'murloc charge' returns all cards where text content contains murloc AND charge.

texts.title: Character *
descriptions: Character * can be used for searching partial words, for example :
items: searching wol* returns cards beginning with wol like Wolrider or Timber Wolf.

texts.title: Character "
descriptions: Character " searchs a text block. For example, searching "other minions" returns cards containing this text block.

texts.title: Facets
descriptions: Facets are filters that can be applied and cumulated for searching.
For instance, a facet can filter on card class. By selecting Warlock, search results is filtered to display only warlock cards.
Also, by selecting Epic from Type facet, search results are again filtered to display only epic warlocks cards.
Number between parenthesis at right of a facet is the number of results of this facet. This number is dynamic and relates to current search.

texts.title: Casting Cost
descriptions: Filters search results based on casting cost.

texts.title: Class
descriptions: Filters search results based on class value :
